verses.name: Genesis 42:27
verses.text: And as one of them opened his sack to give his ass provender in the inn, he espied his money; for, behold, it was in his sack’s mouth.

verses.name: Genesis 42:28
verses.text: And he said unto his brethren, My money is restored; and, lo, it is even in my sack: and their heart failed them, and they were afraid, saying one to another, What is this that God hath done unto us?

verses.name: Genesis 42:29
verses.text: And they came unto Jacob their father unto the land of Canaan, and told him all that befell unto them; saying,
